title: Lux Nerf is UNBEARABLE
body:
Hey Gamers,

i want to bring attention to a huge crime riot wants to commit in the game which is the upcoming nerv of our beloved Luxanna.
Taking away the ult cd reset really decreases her late game potential and makes her extremely weak compared with other ap supports.
I payed very much money on skins for her and am always happy when a new one releases because she is my favorite champion. I will stop spending money if she gets nerfed like this.

Most sincerely,

a worried gamer.
